"Inanna": "This is the Interval Area. Your time limit does not elapse while you are here."
"Please do not forget to prepare for the next mission, such as by purchasing recovery items and discussing your strategy."
"If you want to proceed without waiting, you can use the teleporter to move on to the next area."
"If even one person moves on, the time limit will resume, so make sure that you all agree that you are ready to proceed."
